description: The Licence Holder shall construct <<a(n)>> <<earth/clay/concrete etc>> dam not exceeding <<height>> metres above <<ordnance datum or local stated datum>> in height complete with flood spillways and fish pass in accordance with <<refer to dates and numbers of drawings and or method statements>> submitted to and approved by the Agency or such minor amendments to these documents that are accepted in writing by the Agency prior to the date of commencement of construction.
